org.apache.juneau.serializer.Serializer

    Package Description
    org.apache.juneau.csv
    CSV serialization and parsing support
    org.apache.juneau.html
    HTML serialization and parsing support
    org.apache.juneau.jena
    Jena-based RDF serialization and parsing support
    org.apache.juneau.jso
    Java-serialized-object support
    org.apache.juneau.json
    JSON serialization and parsing support
    org.apache.juneau.msgpack
    JSON serialization and parsing support

    Plain-text serialization and parsing support

    REST client API
    org.apache.juneau.serializer
    Serializer API
    org.apache.juneau.soap
    SOAP/XML serialization and parsing support

    URL encoding serialization and parsing support
    org.apache.juneau.xml
    XML serialization and parsing support

    • Uses of Serializer in org.apache.juneau.html

      Subclasses of Serializer in org.apache.juneau.html 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HtmlDocSerializer
      Serializes POJOs to HTTP responses as HTML documents.
      class  HtmlSchemaDocSerializer
      Serializes POJO metamodels to HTML.
      class  HtmlSerializer
      Serializes POJO models to HTML.
      static class  HtmlSerializer.Sq
      Default serializer, single quotes.
      static class  HtmlSerializer.SqReadable
      Default serializer, single quotes, whitespace added.
      class  HtmlStrippedDocSerializer
      Serializes POJOs to HTTP responses as stripped HTML.

    • Uses of Serializer in org.apache.juneau.jena

      Modifier and Type Class and Description

      Serializes POJOs to RDF.
      static class  RdfSerializer.N3
      Produces N3 output
      static class  RdfSerializer.NTriple
      Produces N-Triple output
      static class  RdfSerializer.Turtle
      Produces Turtle output
      static class  RdfSerializer.Xml
      Produces RDF/XML output
      static class  RdfSerializer.XmlAbbrev
      Produces Abbreviated RDF/XML output

    • Uses of Serializer in org.apache.juneau.json

      Subclasses of Serializer in org.apache.juneau.json 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  JsonSchemaSerializer
      Serializes POJO metadata to HTTP responses as JSON.
      class  JsonSerializer
      Serializes POJO models to JSON.
      static class  JsonSerializer.Readable
      Default serializer, with whitespace.
      static class  JsonSerializer.Simple
      Default serializer, single quotes, simple mode.
      static class  JsonSerializer.SimpleReadable
      Default serializer, single quotes, simple mode, with whitespace.
      static class  JsonSerializer.SimpleReadableSafe
      Default serializer, single quotes, simple mode, with whitespace and recursion detection.

      Serializes POJOs to plain text using just the toString() method on the serialized object.

    • Uses of Serializer in org.apache.juneau.rest.client

      Methods in org.apache.juneau.rest.client that return Serializer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Serializer RestClient.getSerializer()
      Returns the serializer currently associated with this client.
      protected Serializer RestCall.getSerializer()
      Returns the serializer specified on the client to use for serializing HTTP request bodies.
      Methods in org.apache.juneau.rest.client with parameters of type Serializer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RestClient RestClient.setSerializer(Serializer serializer)
      Sets the serializer used for serializing POJOs to the HTTP request message body.
      Method parameters in org.apache.juneau.rest.client with type arguments of type Serializer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RestClient RestClient.setSerializer(Class<? extends Serializer> c)
      Same as RestClient.setSerializer(Serializer), except takes in a serializer class that will be instantiated through a no-arg constructor.
      Constructors in org.apache.juneau.rest.client with parameters of type Serializer 
      Constructor and Description
      RestClient(org.apache.http.impl.client.CloseableHttpClient httpClient, Serializer s, Parser p)
      Create a new client with the specified serializer and parser instances.
      RestClient(Serializer s, Parser p)
      Create a new client with the specified serializer and parser instances.
      RestRequestEntity(Object input, Serializer serializer)
      Constructor.
      Constructor parameters in org.apache.juneau.rest.client with type arguments of type Serializer 
      Constructor and Description
      RestClient(Class<? extends Serializer> s, Class<? extends Parser> p)
      Create a new client with the specified serializer and parser classes.
      RestClient(org.apache.http.impl.client.CloseableHttpClient httpClient, Class<? extends Serializer> s, Class<? extends Parser> p)
      Create a new client with the specified serializer and parser classes.

      Subclass of Serializer for byte-based serializers.

      Serializer Serializer.addToDictionary(Class<?>... classes) 
      Serializer Serializer.clone() 
      Serializer SerializerMatch.getSerializer()
      Returns the serializer that matched the HTTP Accept header value.
      Serializer SerializerGroup.getSerializer(MediaType mediaType)
      Same as SerializerGroup.getSerializerMatch(MediaType) but returns just the matched serializer.
      Serializer SerializerGroup.getSerializer(String acceptHeader)
      Same as SerializerGroup.getSerializerMatch(String) but returns just the matched serializer.
      Serializer Serializer.lock() 
      Serializer Serializer.setClassLoader(ClassLoader classLoader) 
      Serializer Serializer.setProperty(String property, Object value) 
      Methods in org.apache.juneau.serializer with parameters of type Serializer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SerializerGroup SerializerGroup.append(Serializer s)
      Adds the specified serializer to the beginning of this group.
      Method parameters in org.apache.juneau.serializer with type arguments of type Serializer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SerializerGroup SerializerGroup.append(Class<? extends Serializer> s)
      Same as SerializerGroup.append(Class[]), except specify a single class to avoid unchecked compile warnings.

    • Uses of Serializer in org.apache.juneau.urlencoding

      Subclasses of Serializer in org.apache.juneau.urlencoding 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  UonSerializer
      Serializes POJO models to UON (a notation for URL-encoded query parameter values).
      static class  UonSerializer.Encoding
      Equivalent to new UonSerializer().setProperty(UonSerializerContext.UON_encodeChars,true);.
      static class  UonSerializer.Readable
      Equivalent to new UonSerializer().setProperty(UonSerializerContext.UON_useWhitespace,true);.
      static class  UonSerializer.Simple
      Equivalent to new UonSerializer().setProperty(UonSerializerContext.UON_simpleMode,true);.
      static class  UonSerializer.SimpleEncoding
      Equivalent to new UonSerializer().setProperty(UonSerializerContext.UON_simpleMode,true).setProperty(UonSerializerContext.UON_encodeChars,true);.
      class  UrlEncodingSerializer
      Serializes POJO models to URL-encoded notation with UON-encoded values (a notation for URL-encoded query paramter values).
      static class  UrlEncodingSerializer.Readable
      Equivalent to new UrlEncodingSerializer().setProperty(UonSerializerContext.UON_useWhitespace,true);.
      static class  UrlEncodingSerializer.Simple
      Equivalent to new UrlEncodingSerializer().setProperty(UonSerializerContext.UON_simpleMode,true);.
      static class  UrlEncodingSerializer.SimpleExpanded
      Equivalent to new UrlEncodingSerializer().setProperty(UonSerializerContext.UON_simpleMode,true).setProperty(UonSerializerContext.URLENC_expandedParams,true);.

    • Uses of Serializer in org.apache.juneau.xml

      Subclasses of Serializer in org.apache.juneau.xml 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  XmlDocSerializer
      Serializes POJOs to HTTP responses as XML.
      static class  XmlDocSerializer.Simple
      Default serializer without namespaces.
      class  XmlSchemaDocSerializer
      Serializes POJO metadata to HTTP responses as XML.
      class  XmlSchemaSerializer
      Serializes POJO metadata to HTTP responses as XML.
      class  XmlSerializer
      Serializes POJO models to XML.
      static class  XmlSerializer.Ns
      Default serializer without namespaces.
      static class  XmlSerializer.NsSq
      Default serializer without namespaces, single quotes.
      static class  XmlSerializer.NsSqReadable
      Default serializer without namespaces, single quotes, with whitespace.
      static class  XmlSerializer.Sq
      Default serializer, single quotes.
      static class  XmlSerializer.SqReadable
      Default serializer, single quotes, whitespace added.
